title: SET_PLAYER_CULLING_RADIUS
content:
0x8A2FBAD4// SetPlayerCullingRadius
void SET_PLAYER_CULLING_RADIUS(char* playerSrc, float radius);Parameters:playerSrc: The player to set the culling radius for.radius: The radius.Sets the culling radius for the specified player.
Set to 0.0 to reset.WARNING: Culling natives are deprecated and have known, unfixable issues
codeBlocks:
// SetPlayerCullingRadius
